name: Seductive Tombs: Beach Love
description:
It's puzzle time and Seductive Tombs series is back with the hottest girls, lovely beaches and some nice weather! Find the right combinations of levers to solve the puzzle and reveal high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls! Earn all the stars to beat record scores and unlock achievements.

Now with the Skip Level feature!

  • 15 challenging levels
  • Uncensored content
  • Beat the record times to earn stars
  • Realistic graphics
  • Atmospheric music
  • 30 achievements
  • Display girls from the gallery
  • Easily skip levels - unlock girls if you can't beat a level for more than 10 mins
